price: ដូចេ្នះ តើអ្នកដែលបង្កើត ដូចនឹងអ្នកដែលមិនបានបង្កើត ឬ? តើពួកអ្នកមិនចងចាំទេឬ?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
